location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire, to Neil Benjamin Edmonstone, Secretary in the Secret, Political and Foreign Department, Fort William, Calcutta

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, and some of the body of the letter has been obscured as a result.

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a copy of Nicholas Hankey Smith's letter of the 20 July 1807 (see f. 17) to the Resident at Muscat.
